| Property   | Attribute  | Description | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------- | --------- | ----------- |

| `icon`     | `icon`     | Icon        | `string`  | `''`        |
| `theme`    | `theme`    | 风格          | `string`  | `'default'` |
